name: Can you? (Veliton)
description:
Try keeping the can in the air as long as possible. When it falls, you lose. Score points by hitting the can with bullets.

Use the A/D or arrow keys to move your weapon. Use SPACE to shoot.

By hitting the appering coins, you will get a shotgun for a limited time. 

This game was made for Mini Jam 117: Ghosts with the limitation: Shotgun as a mechanic, using the Unity game engine and with sound effects from the Post Apocalypse Guns package from the Unity asset store and freesounds.org.
